title: Create Profile page with AR game synchronization

requirements.text: Create a new Profile page route at /profile on Quantumoney.app that displays player data synchronized from QuantumoneyAR.app game canisters (ippxc-5iaaa-aaaae-qgwqq-cai, x5shd-hqaaa-aaaap-qrdgq-cai, i7nyb-2yaaa-aaaaj-qowiq-cai, lkawl-3qaaa-aaaac-qdsoq-cai)

quotes: Criar página de Perfil no site Quantumoney.app com sincronização total com QuantumoneyAR.app

acceptanceCriteria: New route /profile is accessible from the main site navigation
Page connects to all four specified game canisters
Profile page is an isolated patch that does not modify other existing pages

requirements.text: Display player XP (experience points) from the AR game canisters in the profile view with real-time synchronization
acceptanceCriteria: XP value is fetched from the game canisters
XP is displayed in a prominent, readable format

requirements.text: Display player coins/currency balance from the AR game canisters in the profile view with real-time synchronization
acceptanceCriteria: Coin balance is fetched from the game canisters
Balance is displayed with appropriate formatting

requirements.text: Display captured monsters collection from the AR game canisters showing all monsters the player has caught
acceptanceCriteria: Monster data is fetched from the game canisters
All captured monsters are displayed in an organized view
Each monster shows relevant details (name, type, or other identifying info)

requirements.text: Apply dynamic background styling to the profile page with transparent window panels, yellow borders on all containers, and yellow text for headings and key information

quotes: Layout: fundo dinâmico, janelas transparentes, bordas amarelas, textos amarelos

acceptanceCriteria: All panel/card elements use transparent backgrounds with visible yellow borders
Primary text elements (headings, labels) are rendered in yellow
Design is visually cohesive and distinct from other pages

requirements.text: Ensure the footer remains unmodified and does not include any Caffeine credits or references

quotes: sem referências á Caffeine nos rodapés, sem alterações no rodapé

acceptanceCriteria: Footer component is not modified by this patch
No Caffeine branding or credits appear in the footer
Existing footer content and styling remain intact

constraints: Do not modify any existing pages or routes outside of the new Profile page
Do not alter the Footer component or any footer content
Must connect to exactly these four game canisters: ippxc-5iaaa-aaaae-qgwqq-cai, x5shd-hqaaa-aaaap-qrdgq-cai, i7nyb-2yaaa-aaaaj-qowiq-cai, lkawl-3qaaa-aaaac-qdsoq-cai
All game data synchronization must be read-only from the AR app canisters
nonGoals: Modifying authentication or Internet Identity flows
Changing the Header or navigation structure
Altering any other existing pages (Home, Wallet, DAO, etc.)
Adding write capabilities to modify game data
Creating new backend endpoints or modifying main.mo
